channel.title: Change on Gábor — Essays on Software Architecture, Judgment and Change
channel.description: Recent content in Change on Gábor — Essays on Software Architecture, Judgment and Change

item.title: Degrees of Freedom of a System
item.description: A way to think about flexibility as a structural property rather than a personality trait, and why systems lose their ability to change long before anyone notices.

item.title: Architecture Should Grow, Not Mutate
item.description: How irreversible decisions quietly accumulate, why “refactoring the whole thing” is rarely possible, and what it means for architecture to gain mass over time.
